body_html:
I think a 2x slowdown is too frightening without doing some more work to reduce, since dynamic_stitch shows up in the embedding layers of a lot of models. Would you be interested in trying the new C++ op to see if that reduces the gap? I'm afraid it wouldn't reduce it all that much, though, since as is the gradients are very simple.

@ebrevdo Do you have any thoughts here? I think the embedding usage of dynamic stitch doesn't have this problem since the indices are all unique there. Unfortunately, the op doesn't know that.
